amendatorysection.catchline: Odometers; motor vehicle dealer; duties; violation; effect.
amendatorysection.para: No licensed motor vehicle dealer shall have in his or her possession as inventory for sale any used motor vehicle of an age of less than twenty-five years for which the dealer does not have in his or her possession the transferor's statement required by section 60-192 unless a certificate of title has been issued for such motor vehicle in the name of the dealer. Violation of sections 60-190 to 60-196 shall be grounds for suspension or revocation of a motor vehicle dealer's license under the Motor Vehicle Industry Regulation Act.

crossreference.para: Motor Vehicle Industry Regulation Act, see section 60-1401.
